caption: Get Transactions
doc: Get transactions of a given wallet address

AAl.caption: Address
AAl.doc: Wallet address you want to check.
AAl.name: address

AAm.caption: Testnet
AAm.doc: For checking mainnet balance, leave it unchecked.
AAm.name: chain

AAs.caption: Limit
AAs.doc: Amount of transactions. If empty action will return 10 by default
AAs.name: limit
